name: Potion Seller
description:
This is a game made for the Ludum Dare 42, Check out the page on the LD website for all the info! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/potion-seller

v0.2 We've fixed some of the key issues that we found bothered people. (If you're going to rate us though, please rate it based on the jam entry version!)

  • Things now have outlines when you mouse over them. This helps you know what you're going to click on.
  • The colliders on the items in bowls are now based on the items, rather than the bowl.
  • You can now find item recipes by clicking on the customers desired item, or the ingredients in the recipe book! This will help you spend more time crafting, and less time paging through the book.
  • We re-balanced some of the next item pricing to get you to the end game a bit quicker
